title: Regulations on drug tests for gardaí being finalised
desc: The Department of Justice is finalising regulations needed to test serving garda members for drugs and alcohol.

title: Traitors: Rachel Duffy on 'lowest of lows' of mother's death
desc: Rachel Duffy has spoken publicly for the first time about winning The Traitors and then losing her mother.

title: Court quashes objection from administrators in Genting estate case
desc: The High Court allows Marcus Chan to challenge administrators managing his late mother’s RM1.6 billion inheritance.

title: Met Police apologise to Forsyth after Mandelson tip
desc: Lord Mandelson's lawyers said police arrested the peer because of a "baseless" suggestion he was planning to move abroad.

title: Would such a 'plague upon their houses' be inflicted on rugby and GAA fans who use pyro?
desc: The 42′s football writer assesses Patrick O’Donovan’s Thatcherite performance this week.

title: Trump Serves McDonald's To Olympic Hockey Champs And Many Fans Aren't Lovin' It
desc: Karoline Leavitt said the president's fast-food feast proved that "he knows how to celebrate champions."

title: Musk's AI power plant generates sound and fury in Mississippi
desc: The jet-engine roar has been almost nonstop in a Mississippi town, residents say, since 27 turbines arrived on trailers to power Elon Musk’s AI ambitions.

title: Met Police apologise to Forsyth after Mandelson tip-off error
desc: Lord Mandelson's lawyers said police arrested the peer because of a "baseless" suggestion he was planning to move abroad.

title: NASA reviews moon rocket Artemis II amid helium flow issues
desc: NASA’S ARTEMIS II is being wheeled back in for repair because a disruption of helium flow to the moon rocket’s space launch system (SLS) is impairing its ability to lift off.

title: GoldBod to buy 127 tonnes of gold annually - Ato Forson
desc: The Minister of Finance, Dr Cassiel Ato Forson has revealed that Ghana Gold Board (GoldBod) will buy gold up to 127 tonnes from artisanal and small-scale miners annually.
